full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS GLUD CHOG MCHOD SBYIN RGYA MTSO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(GLUD CHOG MCHOD SBYIN RGYA MTSO SPEL BAS BDAG ,RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA RGYA MTSO'I MTHAR SON TE, ,KUN MKHYEN YE SHES RGYA MTSOR DBANG THOB NAS, ,'KHOR BA SDUG BSNGAL RGYA MTSO SKEM BYED SHOG ,'DI YANG DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, ,RTA MGRIN CHOS SKOR YANG LAG TU, ,SBYAR BA'I YI GE 'DI 'DU BYED MKHAN, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' YIN, ,DGE'O, ,)
